scripts.install: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.check:frontend: npx eslint@8.57.1 frontend; npx prettier frontend --check
scripts.check: npm run check:frontend && npm run check:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.reset: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && cd backend && rm -rf instance && pipenv run flask db upgrade && pipenv run flask seed all && docker compose up -d --build
